column4: *sighs*
I don't understand how to install anything. ;_; I really don't want to have to go back to WIndows. So much drama. >_>
Oh, everything. :)
you will need to be much more specific
you don't need adobe reader, you should already have a pdf reader
just click on a pdf
have you tried clicking on a pdf?
pdfs 'just work', you don't need to install anything special, and adobe's reader is rather subpar
ntfsfix?
you have entered the wrong path to the file
you don't litterally type 'local/to/exe.exe' you substitute the actual path and filename
where did you put the file?
no i mean, where is the file you are trying to run?
you just type 'wine'
you typed 'wine PROGRAM.exe' ?
program.exe doesn't exist
'wine' that's it, just type 'wine' and press enter
it should not be asking about any executable files
that's normal
now what program do you want to install using wine?
download the utorrent installer
